text: Prva HNL is a football league which is top division in Croatia. == Club 2009/10 == * Dinamo Zagreb * Hajduk Split * Rijeka * Slaven Belupo Koprivnica * Zagreb * Šibenik * Osijek * Cibalia Vinkovci * Inter Zaprešić * Varteks Varaždin * Zadar * Croatia Sesvete * Istra * Karlovac * Lokomotiva * Međimurje == Champions == Season Champions Runner-up Third place 2000/01 Hajduk Split Dinamo Zagreb Osijek 2001/02 Zagreb Hajduk Split Dinamo Zagreb 2002/03 Dinamo Zagreb Hajduk Split Varteks Varaždin 2003/04 Hajduk Split Dinamo Zagreb Rijeka 2004/05 Hajduk Split Inter Zaprešić Zagreb 2005/06 Dinamo Zagreb Rijeka Varteks Varaždin 2006/07 Dinamo Zagreb Hajduk Split Zagreb 2007/08 Dinamo Zagreb Slaven Belupo Koprivnica Osijek 2008/09 Dinamo Zagreb Hajduk Split Rijeka === Former champions === * 1992 : Hajduk Split * 1992/93 : Croatia Zagreb * 1993/94 : Hajduk Split * 1994/95 : Hajduk Split * 1995/96 : Croatia Zagreb * 1996/97 : Croatia Zagreb * 1997/98 : Croatia Zagreb * 1998/99 : Croatia Zagreb * 1999/00 : Croatia Zagreb == References == Category:Football leagues in Europe
title: Croatian Football League
